value.html:
About Me

Hi, I'm Sarah Wilkes, a mostly self- and online-taught web developer with some content strategy background.

Find me on LinkedIn and Twitter.

Projects

  • A page about yoyos I made using Create-React-App and Tailwind.
  • The HTML and CSS for a to-be-released theme in the Primo sitebuilder, from a design comp. The page you're reading now was also built and deployed with Primo.
  • While I was at NewCity, I worked on content migration and CMS documentation for the Edward Via College of Osteopathic Medicine (VCOM) and built the content types in Drupal for The Benton Museum of Art at Pomona College, among other things.
